title: Largest Net Portfolio Investment Deficit
description: In 2023, the United States had a net portfolio investment deficit of $1,149,515,000,000, the largest in the world.

title: Highest Current Health Expenditure Per Capita
description: In 2022, the United States spent $12,434.43 per capita on health, the highest in the world.

title: Most Secure Internet Servers
description: In 2023, the United States had 62,879,335 secure internet servers, the highest number globally.

title: Highest Education Expenditure
description: In 2021, the United States spent $1,046,599,480,744.69 on education, the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Prevalence of Wasting Among Children
description: In 2022, the prevalence of wasting among children under 5 in the United States was 0.1%, the lowest in the world.
